title: Executive Order Extending the Enforcement Delay Related to TikTok
summary: This executive order extends the enforcement delay originally specified in Executive Order 14166, which pertains to the application of certain laws and restrictions concerning the use of TikTok by U.S. government agencies or individuals, authorizing further postponement of enforcement actions related to TikTok.

title: Proclamation Commemorating the 250th Anniversary of the Battle of Bunker Hill
summary: A presidential proclamation recognizing the 250th anniversary of the Battle of Bunker Hill, highlighting the historical significance of the event and its role in American history, and honoring the bravery of those who participated in the battle.

title: Nominations Sent to the Senate for Several Department and Agency Positions
summary: The President has submitted nominations to the Senate for individuals to fill various positions in the federal government, including Assistant Secretary of State for Democracy, Human Rights, and Labor; Assistant Secretary of Veterans Affairs for Information and Technology; Under Secretary for Benefits of the Department of Veterans Affairs; and other roles. These nominations are part of the process of confirming officials to serve in senior positions within government agencies.

title: Proclamation Recognizing Father's Day 2025
summary: The President's proclamation acknowledging Father's Day 2025 emphasizes the role of fathers as leaders of families, protectors of security, and contributors to societal strength. The proclamation highlights the importance of honoring fathers for their love, devotion, and example in shaping the next generation.

title: Presidential Proclamation for Flag Day and National Flag Week 2025
summary: This proclamation recognizes June 14, 2025, as Flag Day and designates the period of June 14 through June 20, 2025, as National Flag Week. It highlights the historical significance of the adoption of the American flag on June 14, 1777, and encourages Americans to observe the week by displaying the flag and reflecting on its meaning as a symbol of the nationâ€™s history and values.

title: Presidential Executive Order Addressing the Proposed Acquisition of United States Steel Corporation by Nippon Steel Corporation
summary: The order, issued by the President, authorizes a review by the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States concerning the proposed acquisition of United States Steel Corporation by Nippon Steel Corporation. The review is conducted under the authority of the Defense Production Act of 1950, as amended, to assess potential impacts on national security and related considerations of the proposed transaction.

title: Proclamation Celebrating the 250th Anniversary of the United States Army
summary: A presidential proclamation commemorating the 250th anniversary of the founding of the United States Army, highlighting the historical significance of the Army's establishment on June 14, 1775, and recognizing its contributions to the nation's history, strength, service, valor, and discipline.

title: Memorandum directing actions related to environmental policies and power generation in the Columbia River Basin
summary: This memorandum, issued by the President, addresses the roles of specified federal agencies in implementing policies related to environmental management and power generation within the Columbia River Basin. It concerns strategies and directives aimed at regulating environmental practices to support energy development in the region.
